description: This is validation for file metadata fields that the OSF allows to be edited by the user. These fields will match the fields presented to the user on a file metadata form on the OSF.
title: OSF Specific Fields for the Datacite Schema

___related_publication_doi.description: The DOI of a related resource.

___funders.description: Funders responsible for funding the resource.

___funding_agency.description: The name of the funding provider

___grant_number.description: The code assigned by the funder to a sponsored award (grant).
